text: Lɨhavɨdaci 9.27 HJL 4.36, 9.4, 9.20-22, 1 Ko 9.1, 15.8 Banabasɨ agaŋ Solɨ dɨ via hulaŋ Jisasɨ lɨbɨmɨŋami agɨladɨ pɨŋ umi. Uavɨla nulɨdɨ tɨbi sulami. Solɨ agaŋ hɨbɨ cina nudɨ Hekɨlɨ dɨ igɨci nudɨ abami agasaŋ tɨbi sulami. Damasɨkusɨ haiabɨla hɨnihɨni Jisasɨ dɨ ibi agasaŋ haiabɨla iahaiaha ciaŋ abadami agasaŋ avi tɨbi sulami.
